body: Long believed to have been gnome in origin, this stately cummerbund features a number of dancing dolphins embroidered on its deep blue material. The cummerbund grants its wearer a +4 competence bonus on Swim checks, and allows her to take 10 on such checks even if distracted or endangered.
name: Aquatic Cummerbund
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Belt/Belt Slot Wondrous Items/Aquatic Cummerbund
